name: SanctuaryRPG: Black Edition - Piano Collection
detailed_description:
You asked for it, here is the Piano Collection for SanctuaryRPG!

Tracklist


  • 1. Sanctuary Arp ~Piano Version~
  • 2. Wind World ~Piano Version~
  • 3. Westhaven ~Piano Version~
  • 4. Interlude (bonus track)
  • 5. Beer Tap Soca ~Piano Version~
  • 6. You May Be Experiencing Some Discomfort ~Piano Version~
  • 7. Fire World ~Piano Version~ (to Broken Pony)
  • 8. The Grasslands ~Piano Version~
  • 9. The Hook is Unreal ~Piano Version~
  • 10. Wave Fist Sparring ~Piano Version~
  • 11. Water World ~Piano Version~
  • 12. Fantasia Impromptu (bonus track)

The Soundtrack will be placed in your SanctuaryRPG folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\SanctuaryRPG - Black Edition[/i]
